thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 2 of 1678
thread.title: Jonathan D.

author: Jonathan D.
title: Jonathan D.
text: This was my first time using Flighthub. I typically use expedia for most of my travel bookings but I decided to give flight hub a shot since "why not?" I ended up finding a killer deal from Edmonton, AB to Keflavik, Iceland. Easily the cheapest flight to Iceland I have been able to find thus far. Best thing is that it's a direct flight. I compared prices to expedia and I saved $200 and there are no layovers. I'd definitely use flighthub again.
